description: The Leica Q2 is a full-frame compact camera with a 47.3MP sensor, 4K video recording, and advanced autofocus technology.

reviews_list.comment: This camera is amazing! The picture quality is fantastic and the autofocus is lightning fast. Highly recommended.
I'm really happy with this camera so far. The only downside is the price, but you get what you pay for.
